title: Tournament 5v5 - The Spodar Challenge #3
body:
Hello guys, this Wednesday there is a 5v5 one day tournament for all players ranked from Unranked to Gold 1 in Solo/DuoQ (flex rank doesn't count)!
To enter the tournament, just register for free on Thumblecrash and create your team, then join the tournament!
Every week one day tournaments with 20000+ RP as total prizes!
